snippet: In an interview with the BBC, Malala Yousafzai said that “the terrorists and extremists” who tried to kill her a year ago might now regret doing so, because of the global backlash against them.
abstract: In an interview with the BBC, Malala Yousafzai said that “the terrorists and extremists” who tried to kill her a year ago might now regret doing so, because of the global backlash against them.

headline.main: Pakistani Girl Shot by Taliban Says Militants Only Helped Amplify Her Message
